items.title: Carney Gets Down to Work as Canada Election Drumbeat Grows
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Mark Carney laid the groundwork to take over as Canada’s prime minister as soon as this week, appointing a chief of staff and promising a speedy transition to a new cabinet that he says will be focused on the economy and fighting back against US tariffs. items.title: Goldman Sachs managing director Scott Rubner leaves firm, source says
items.description: Scott Rubner, a managing director in the derivatives sales and macro execution team at Goldman Sachs, has left the investment bank, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday. ...

items.title: Hedge funds cut risk in stocks at largest amount in two years, Goldman Sachs says
items.description: NEW YORK -Hedge funds reduced their exposure to stocks on Friday at the largest amount in more than two years, according to a Goldman Sachs note released on Monday. The bank added some...
